Different sets of tasks will grant different rewards from Peter, who can be found panning just west of the Museum Camp. Each set of tasks will reward 5 unidentified fossils of the same type, which means doing these tasks will provide an opportunity to fill one Paleontology exhibit in the Varrock Museum.

Advanced data
Object ID31846

The notice board is a notice board which displays tasks players may do on Fossil Island. Different sets of tasks will grant different rewards from Peter, who can be found panning just west of the Museum Camp. Each set of tasks will reward 5 unidentified fossils of the same type, which means doing these tasks will provide an opportunity to fill one Paleontology exhibit in the Varrock Museum.

Contents

  • 1 Island tasks
    • 1.1 Museum Camp
    • 1.2 Northern Reaches
    • 1.3 Southern Swamps
    • 1.4 Mountainous East

Island tasks[edit | edit source]

Museum Camp[edit | edit source]

After completing this list, players can receive 5 unidentified small fossils by speaking to Peter. The items needed in total are 25 nails, 10 oak planks, 5 planks, 3 soft clay, 2 iron bars, 2 logs, 2 ropes, a bucket, as well as a hammer and a tinderbox. Nails do not bend on any of the objects.

Task Skill(s) Needed Items Needed
1. Construct the bank chest. 21
  • Hammer
  • 2 Oak plank
  • Iron bar
  • 5 Nails
2. Construct the archaeologists' cleaning bench. 5
  • Hammer
  • 5 Plank
  • 5 Nails
3. Construct the well. 22
  • Hammer
  • 2 Oak plank
  • Bucket
  • Rope
  • 5 Nails
4. Construct the cooking pot. 24
  • Hammer
  • 2 Logs
  • Tinderbox
  • Iron bar
  • 3 Soft clay
5. Construct the spinning wheel. 28
  • Hammer
  • 4 Oak plank
  • 5 Nails
6. Construct the loom. 29
  • Hammer
  • 2 Oak plank
  • Rope
  • 5 Nails

Northern Reaches[edit | edit source]

After completing this list, players can receive 5 unidentified small fossils by speaking to Peter.

Task Skill(s) Needed Items Needed Notes
1. Unlock the Mushtree of Mushroom Meadow. None None
2. Feed an enriched bone into the machine in the House on the Hill. None
  • Enriched bone, OR
  • Fossil Island fossil
  • 10-20 calcite
  • 10-20 pyrophosphite
 To obtain an enriched bone, use any type of Fossil Island fossil alongside a few (10-20) calcite and pyrophosphite at the mycelium pool.
3. Find an Ancient Diary in the House on the Hill. None None The diary is found in the basement of the House.
4. Unlock the Mushtree of the House on the Hill. None None
5. Visit the task-only Wyvern cave. None None The entrance is located south of the mushtree of the Mushroom Forest.
6. Collect mermaid tears underwater. None None Players may catch pufferfish in order to maintain oxygen levels, as the area this task is done in does not permit diving gear.
7. Set up a drift net to catch fish. 47 , 44
  • Drift net
  • 200 Numulite

Recommended:

  • Fishbowl helmet
  • diving apparatus
  • Flippers
8. Harvest seaweed from an underwater Farming patch. 23
  • Seaweed spore
  • seed dibber

Recommended:

  • 200 numulite
  • Ultracompost

It is recommended to pay Mernia 200 numulite to ensure it grows disease-free.

Southern Swamps[edit | edit source]

After completing this list, players can receive 5 unidentified medium fossils by speaking to Peter.

Task Skill(s) Needed Items Needed Notes
1. Unlock the Mushtree of the Sticky Swamp. None None Food is recommended
2. Find the diary of Charles Charlington. None Breadcrumbs Use breadcrumbs on the bellshroom found south-west of the Magic Mushtree. You must have started the Recipe for Disaster/Freeing Pirate Pete quest section to be able to make the breadcrumbs.
3. Fill a pit with Bittercap mushrooms. None 9 Mushroom The pit is found east of the mushtree of the Tar Swamp.
4. Successfully chop a sulliuscep. 65 Any axe
5. Poison a sulliuscep with fungicide and a proboscis. 65
  • Fungicide spray
  • 1 proboscis
 A fungicide spray with at least one charge must be used.
6. Stun a tar monster. None Hoop snake Throw the hoop snake to the tar monster to stun it. To obtain a hoop snake, choose the 'stun' option on the snake while holding a crush weapon.
7. Kill the Deranged archaeologist. High combat level None Magic with good gear and food is highly recommended to fight him. See here for more details.

Mountainous East[edit | edit source]

After completing this list, players can receive 5 unidentified medium fossils by speaking to Peter.

Task Skill(s) Needed Items Needed
1. Unlock the Mushtree of the Verdant Valley. None None
2. Catch birds in a birdhouse in the Verdant Valley. 5
  • Any type of Bird house
  • 10 low level hop seeds or herb seeds (Krandorian/Harralander or lower) or 5 high level seeds (Wildblood/Ranarr or above)
3. Mine some volcanic ash. 22 Any pickaxe
4. Make ultracompost from volcanic ash. None
  • 2 Volcanic ash
  • Supercompost
5. Enter the Volcanic Mine. 50 , 150 Kudos 30 Numulite
6. Use the rope shortcut on the volcano's north-west slope. 64 None
